title: wxAssertionError: C++ assertion
body:
Thanks for opening this issue, and thanks for using DeepLabCut (we hope you are enjoying it ;). Please fill out the template completely, including the full "traceback" and input code that you ran to hit this error. **operating system - 20.04 LTS and DeepLabCut version - 2.1.9 with pip installed virtual environment** Please complete the following information about your system: OS: Ubuntu 20.04 DeepLabCut Version: 2.1.9 Anaconda env used: **Describe the problem** I'm trying to use label frames with deeplabcut.label_frames, and %gui wx. got the error as shown below wxAssertionError: C++ assertion "!(flags & wxALIGN_RIGHT)" failed at /tmp/pip-install-e31jp07k/wxpython/ext/wxWidgets/src/common/sizer.cpp(2164) in DoInsert(): Horizontal alignment flags are ignored in horizontal sizers Please place code inside this:
import deeplabcut as dlc

[wxAssertionError Traceback (most recent call last) in 1 get_ipython().run_line_magic('gui', 'wx') ----> 2 dlc.label_frames(path_config_file) ~/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/trainingsetmanipulation.py in label_frames(config, multiple_individualsGUI, imtypes) 429 from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset import labeling_toolbox 430 --> 431 labeling_toolbox.show(config, imtypes=imtypes) 432 433 os.chdir(startpath) ~/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/labeling_toolbox.py in show(config, imtypes) 1009 def show(config, imtypes=["*.png"]): 1010 app = wx.App() -> 1011 frame = MainFrame(None, config, imtypes).Show() 1012 app.MainLoop() 1013 ~/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/labeling_toolbox.py in __init__(self, parent, config, imtypes) 257 widgetsizer.AddStretchSpacer(15) 258 self.quit = wx.Button(self.widget_panel, id=wx.ID_ANY, label="Quit") --> 259 widgetsizer.Add(self.quit, 1, wx.ALL | wx.ALIGN_RIGHT, 15) 260 self.quit.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.quitButton) 261 wxAssertionError: C++ assertion "!(flags & wxALIGN_RIGHT)" failed at /tmp/pip-install-e31jp07k/wxpython/ext/wxWidgets/src/common/sizer.cpp(2164) in DoInsert(): Horizontal alignment flags are ignored in horizontal sizers ]

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. define task 2. define experimenter 3. define video_folder 4. extract frames 5. label frames with wxPython
